price: 49. mientras que, antes de que se precipitara sobre ellos, estaban completamente desesperados.
arabic: وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمُبۡلِسِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-in kānū min qabli an yunazzala ʿalayhim min qablihi lamub'lisīna
